items.title: India, South Korea bonds to join FTSE Russell EMGB index starting Sept 2025
items.description: In March review, FTSE had deferred inclusion of Indian bonds in its index due to taxation, registration and settlement issues but acknowledged India's progress in the accessibility of the securities

items.title: Market Today: RBI MPC outcome, global market recovery, Israel war, Oil down
items.description: At 6:34 AM, GIFT Nifty Futures were trading 25 points higher at 25,157, suggesting a flat to positive start for Indian markets.

items.title: Vinay Rajani of HDFC Securities suggests buying these stocks on October 09
items.description: Nifty has retraced 23.6 per cent of the entire fall seen from its all time high. Nifty has also closed near its 50 DMA(25,045).

items.title: SBI is Nomura's top pick, says PSB well set to deliver on asset quality
items.description: Nomura has reaffirmed its 'Buy' rating for SBI, maintaining a target price of Rs 980. This target suggests a potential upside of approximately 25per cent from the previous closing price of Rs 781.

items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 09: NSE F&O data shows that retail investors' are most bullish since the Lok Sabha poll outcome in June; their long-short ratio in index futures rose to 1.44.

items.title: Silver price today: Trend bearish; check key support, resistance levels
items.description: Silver price today: Silver prices crashed to their lowest level since September 19, on Tuesday, as commodities tumbled on multitude of bearish developments

items.title: Gold strategy on October 9: Support at Rs 73,000; Resistance at Rs 76,300
items.description: Spot gold crashed to breach the crucial support around $2620 on Tuesday as commodities witnessed across-the-board selling.
